name: Pinball (itch) (Blake Thoennes)
description:
A pinball game, with a twist!  It features very satisfying sound effects and a high score board.  A second player can control the triangular purple bumper to help extend your combos.  Light up all the lights in a set to release an extra ball.  The more balls you have on the field the faster you get more points and more balls.

This was my final project for my Scripting I class at UTDallas.  The assignment was to create a co-op physics game that included an explosion effect somewhere.

Z/V - Strong paddle hit

X/C - Weak paddle hit

Space - Pull launcher

Arrow Keys - Move the purple triangle bumper
